snippet: Le Palais des Thés makes its American debut on the Upper West Side this week, with a larger boutique to open in SoHo in December.
abstract: Le Palais des Thes, French tea importer and retailer, makes its American debut on Upper West Side, with larger boutique to open in SoHo in December.
lead_paragraph: Le Palais des Thés makes its American debut on the Upper West Side this week, with a larger boutique to open in SoHo in December.

headline.seo: A French Tea Importer Opens in Manhattan — Food Stuff
headline.main: The French Like Their Tea as Well
headline.print_headline: The French Like Their Tea as Well
